# hibble

[![lifecycle](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

Wanna emphasise your output in terminal or in markdown without creating a html table? The **hibble** package provides a rich set of utilities to hightlight the components for `data.frame`-like objects, including header, row/column/cell in stylish ways.

## Working in progress

Not yet for installation.
